message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start!
My turn! Let's be realistic, I'm feeling generous with this offer considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, this is a more than fair offer. Don't be greedy!
Alice, the clock is ticking, and your share is shrinking fast. I'm offering you a fair deal considering the circumstances.
I'd rather take a smaller share now than risk getting nothing. Come on, Bob, meet me halfway!
Alice, this is a good deal for both of us. Don't let time run out and leave us with nothing!
